channel.title: rg on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in rg on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Great LT1 weekend
item.description: 16:05 Sunday 11 March 2018 JST 23:05 Saturday 10 March 2018 JST Bunch of great guys here in Oregon for the LT1 and ST1 dual training. I attended ST1 (Staff Training 1) in Perth last year and am attending LT1 (Leadership Training 1) in Oregon this weekend. Got to meet Alan who I know from my online men’s circle, and met Mike P with dredlocks who I had met online as well.
